snippet.title: Language Learning Simulator : Alphabet #1 Game Play
snippet.description:
LLS : Alphabet is an educational game that allows players to learn new alphabets easily and in a fun way!

- Find the letters in the forest, and carry them to the Wall of Wisdom
- Be careful! There are wild animals on the road!
- Use Safety Stops or tree trunks to protect yourself from wild animals. Animals do not like to climb on them.
- Have fun!

Alphabets Supported : English, Turkish, German, French, Spanish, Portuguese

Languages Supported
Audio: English, French, German, Hindi, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Spanish (Spain), Turkish, Portuguese, Spanish (Latin America)
Text: English, French, German, Hindi, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Spanish (Spain), Turkish, Portuguese, Spanish (Latin America)

Steam Store Link : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3038850

Epic Market Link : https://store.epicgames.com/p/language-learning-simulator-alphabet-00beee
Website : https://butikgamestudios.com/language-learning-simulator-alphabet-published-to-epic-store/
